recipe_name: Pancakes with fudge sauce and ice cream
author: James Martin
method: In a bowl, mix the self-raising flour, baking powder, eggs and milk to form a thick batter. Melt the butter in a frying pan and ladle in the pancake mix a ladleful at a time.  Cook until golden-brown on both sides. Make a stack of pancakes and place on a plate. For the fudge sauce, place the brown sugar in a saucepan with the butter and cream cook for three minutes to form a sauce. Serve with the pile of pancakes and drizzle the sauce on top.
ingredients: 100g/3½oz self-raising flour,  ½ tsp baking powder,  2 free-range eggs,  60ml/2¼fl oz milk,  25g/1oz butter,  25g/1oz brown sugar,  50ml/1¾fl oz double cream,  2 scoops ice cream
